summary: User timeline_9 documents recovery from severe depression, including setbacks and ultimate progress.

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. Life is meaningless I pushed everyone away Started setting better boundaries at work. called the crisis hotline Learned to say no to extra projects. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I hate myself so much I don't care about anything anymore Called my psychiatrist first. started going to therapy We're trying a different medication instead. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm a burden to everyone My performance has been terrible. I'm failing at everything Met with HR about accommodations. reached out to my therapist They're being supportive. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm broken beyond repair I've been having suicidal thoughts Called my psychiatrist first. asked for support We're trying a different medication instead. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I feel completely hopeless I can't get out of bed anymore Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. joined a support group Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm broken beyond repair I don't care about anything anymore Called my psychiatrist first. took my medication as prescribed We're trying a different medication instead. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I'm worthless and pathetic I've been drinking to cope Using the distraction techniques I learned. used my DBT skills Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I have no reason to keep going My performance has been terrible. I'm spiraling out of control Met with HR about accommodations. used my DBT skills They're being supportive. I'm working on self-compassion
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I'm tired of existing Back to square one. I pushed everyone away Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. reached out to my therapist Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. called the crisis hotline So proud of myself. I'm learning healthier coping skills Almost slipped up. I feel completely hopeless But I reached out for help instead. I'm learning healthier coping skills
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I feel completely hopeless Back to square one. I've been drinking to cope Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. used my DBT skills Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
